price: Warra karaa Rabbii keessatti ajjeefaman du’aatti hin yaadin. Dhugumatti isaan jiraatoodha Gooftaa isaanii biratti ni sooramu.
arabic: وَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قُتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَمۡوَٰتَۢاۚ بَلۡ أَحۡيَآءٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ يُرۡزَقُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walā taḥsabanna alladhīna qutilū fī sabīli al-lahi amwātan bal aḥyāon ʿinda rabbihim yur'zaqūna
